field.value:
I'm using Castle Monorail with jQuery tabbed navigation.
When handling a controller action, I would like to redirect to a view, and control which tab is visible. Therefore, I'd like to have my controller redirecting to a specific anchor in a view, something along the lines of:
RedirectToAction("Edit", "id=1", "#roles"));
Resulting in the url: http://localhost/MyApp/User/edit.rails?id=1#roles
However, the actual result encodes the # sign to %23 http://localhost/MyApp/User/edit.rails?id=1&%23roles=&
Both on the forum and stackoverflow stated that I should submit this info here.
http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=5106 http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/t/2254ca9a951c0d http://stackoverflow.com/questions/540830/monorail-redirect-to-anchor
